rooms.Name: Entrance to the Caverns
rooms.Description:
Descending down the long walkway, you enter into a small dank corridor.  
On both sides of the way there is a putrid scum growing on the walls and
torches line the corridor.  The only direction you can go is north.

rooms.Name: Inner Cavern
rooms.Description:
This part of the walkway is slighly brighter and wider than the place
you just came from.  There seem to be more torches here and less scum
growing on the walls.  Halls continue to the north and to the east.

rooms.Name: Eastern Corridor
rooms.Description:
The hallway narrows here, and you have to walk sideways to get through.
It smells sort of musty in here, and you feel a chill go up your spine.
The hall continues to the east and west.

rooms.Name: a Small Alcove
rooms.Description:
This small alcove seems to be carved out of the stone the forms the rest
of the walkway.  There is a putrid puddle on the ground, and it's very dank
in this place.  It's quite eerie, and you do not feel at all safe here.

rooms.Name: The Intersection
rooms.Description:
Three hallways come together here, and to the north there is a small alcove
which seems to be carved out of solid rock.  There are torches on all four
corners, and you can see the hall extending quite a way in the other three
directions.  Choices, choices, choices...

rooms.Name: Southern Hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway is altogether unremarkable.  It's small, narrow, and dank just like
all of the other ones in the cavern.  The only decision you need to make
is if you want to go north or south.

rooms.Name: a Small Crawlway
rooms.Description:
This is the end of the hall.  The ceiling slopes down here and you're
scraping your head on it.  If you want to continue any farther, you're
going to have to get down on your hands and knees.  There don't seem to
be any torches lighting the way to the east either.

rooms.Name: The Hallway
rooms.Description:
This part of the corridor is brightly illuminated by several torches on 
the wall.  The stone seems to be of a slightly higher quality here as well.
Oh well, it probably doesn't mean much, but hey, it's interesting at least.

rooms.Name: a Small Tunnel
rooms.Description:
The ceiling continues to slope down here until it is no more than four 
feet from the ground to the ceiling.  You're already down on your hands
and knees...to continue to the east you'll have to crawl on your stomach.

rooms.Name: The Slime Pit
rooms.Description:
It looks like you've crawled head-first into a pool of slime.  The trick
is going to be getting out of here, since there's little to no room to turn
around.  If you want to get out, you'll have to scurry backwards as fast as
you possibly can!

rooms.Name: Eastern Terminus of the Hall
rooms.Description:
The hallway comes to an abrupt end here.  A small passage is cut in the
wall to the north however.  You wonder what could have cut such a narrow
passageway, since no human could fit through there...or could they?

rooms.Name: The Squeezeway
rooms.Description:
You try with all your might, and you're finally able to wedge your body
through the narrow crevice after taking all of your armour off.  It's a 
good thing there weren't any monsters to block your way!

rooms.Name: A Dank Cavern
rooms.Description:
After coming through the crevice, you find yourself in this dank dark
cavern which is illuminated only by a little light seeping through the
crack.  It looks as if the cavern continues to the north, but you can't
be sure in such dim light.

rooms.Name: The Darkened Chamber
rooms.Description:
This seems to be the dankest and darkest part of the caverns.  Even with
your torch, the air is so heavy here you can't see more than a foot or
two in front of your face.  You might want to run away while you still can!

rooms.Name: 50 Metres Into the Cavern
rooms.Description:
The farther you go into the caverns the darker it gets.  The torches on
the walls seem to be spaced farther and farther apart, as if the creatures
who inhabit this place have grown used to the darkness.

rooms.Name: 100 Metres Into the Cavern
rooms.Description:
Light is practically nonexistent here.  There are a few torches placed on
the walls, but hardly enough to see clearly by.  You can make out the hall
heading to the west and to the south, but you can't see more than a few
metres in either direction.

rooms.Name: The Dark Corridor
rooms.Description:
This dark corridor is just like all of the rest...cold, clammy, and eerie.
You're not sure it's such a good idea venturing down into these caverns.  
Of course, you're bored, so it's just as good as anything else...

rooms.Name: Entrance to the Crypt
rooms.Description:
This room is much brighter than the corridor to the south.  You see a 
cross-shaped room to the north which seems to be almost brightly lit.  You
wonder what sets this place apart from the others.

rooms.Name: Western Alcove
rooms.Description:
This alcove is filled with candles on high stands and the floor is totally
covered with some of the nastiest crud and slime you've ever seen.  It 
almost seems to be moving beneath your feet!

rooms.Name: The Crypt
rooms.Description:
This is the centre of the minor crypt of the caverns.  Strange carvings
adorn all of the walls and there are several candles making this room the
brightest place you've seen yet.  That doesn't mean it's not eerie though...
not to mention very dangerous!

rooms.Name: The Eastern Alcove
rooms.Description:
This alcove used to be very well lit, but it seems several of the candles have
either burned out or been put out by some unknown force.  Maybe it would
be best if you were to leave before you have to find out the hard way!

rooms.Name: The Tomb of the Unknown
rooms.Description:
A large stone sarcophagus lies here on the floor, covered in all sorts of
mold and slimes.  You'll never get it open, since it seems to be very well
protected by all these creatures of misery.

rooms.Name: A Twist in the Stone
rooms.Description:
The rock is very jagged here, and it jogs to the south.  You almost feel
sick crawling through all this slime.  It's really not worth all of this
to try and get killed, is it?

rooms.Name: A Hallway
rooms.Description:
The cavern seems to open up a bit here, and the hallway is actually wide
enough to walk through single file in this place.  What a relief after
trying to crawl through tiny spaces for so long!

rooms.Name: A Small Room
rooms.Description:
Not only is it wide enough to walk here, it's actually wide enough that
you could almost call this a small room!  To the west, it actually looks
as if the cavern opens up into a large chamber.

rooms.Name: Northeast Corner of the Chamber
rooms.Description:
The chamber curves around and forms a nice corner here.  The walls are 
almost smooth, and there's not quite as much crud on the floor here.  It's
almost warm too.  Kind of odd...

rooms.Name: The Chambers
rooms.Description:
The hallway opens up here into a huge chamber.  The ceiling looks to be
almost 3 or 4 metres high here, and there's plenty of room to walk around.
Of course, with all this slime on the floor walking ANYWHERE would be very
difficult!

rooms.Name: Southeast Corner of the Chamber
rooms.Description:
There's an odd draft in this part of the chamber.  Since you don't see any
vents you wonder where in the world it could be coming from.  Oh well, just
chalk it up to another strange feature of this strange place.

rooms.Name: Northern Chamber
rooms.Description:
It must be hundreds of degrees here.  It's strange how temperature and
climate seem to change every 1-2 metres in here.  What an odd and eerie
place!  Get out now!

rooms.Name: Centre of the Chamber
rooms.Description:
Stepping into the centre of the chamber you are sucked into a thick mist
which seems to surround you and choke you.  Your feet seem to be sucked 
into a pile of slime from whick they are unable to escape.  How are you 
going to get out of THIS one?

rooms.Name: The Southern Chamber
rooms.Description:
This part of the chamber seems to be filled with ice and smoke which is
rising from the floor.  You'd better get out of here quickly, or you're
going to freeze to death!

rooms.Name: Northwestern Chamber
rooms.Description:
This part of the chamber is particularly odd.  It seems to be completely
devoid of any cliamte at all.  You feel very comfortable, no matter how
much or how little effort you exert.

rooms.Name: The Curved Wall
rooms.Description:
The wall of the chamber is curved here, and seems to descend down a narrow
staircase near the wall.  You realize that you really should get out of 
this creepy place before descending any deeper.  The deeper you go, the 
more dangerous the fiends that must live there.  After all, they must be
pretty cold and heartless to live with no light.

rooms.Name: Southwestern Chamber
rooms.Description:
It feels like a jungle here.  The stone walls of the chamber here are
completely covered with vines and moss which seem to leap off the wall and
attack you.  If you weren't scared before, you sure are now!

rooms.Name: The Vat
rooms.Description:
Climbing down the stairs, you see yourself in a long metallic grey corridor.
After looking around, you realize that you have descended into the plumbing
system of a large brewery!  You wonder how long this could have been buried
under the caverns.

rooms.Name: a Split in the Pipe
rooms.Description:
The plumbing splits here, turning to the north, south, and west.  All you
can see to the north and south are small alcoves, while the plumbing seems
to stretch forever to the west.  You think you may be able to make out a
ladder to the south as well.

rooms.Name: a Bulge in the Pipe
rooms.Description:
The pipe ends abruptly here, terminating in a large bulge.  There is lots
of rancid pub scum on the floor, and the walls are a little less grey due
to the mold growing on them.  Looks like a dead end.

rooms.Name: In the Pipe
rooms.Description:
You are in the middle of a pretty darn nondescript pipe.  It goes east and
west, and other than that there is really nothing at all exciting about
it.  You should probably just move along...

rooms.Name: a Bend in the Pipe
rooms.Description:
The pipe turns here, heading to the north and the east.  There are lots of
small dings in the walls...probably evidence of some drunken fool careening
through the pipe at insane speeds.  Don't drink and drive!

rooms.Name: a Slight Incline
rooms.Description:
The pipe is at a pretty steep slope here, and you have trouble climbing it
due to all the slippery scum on the floor.  You eventually make it though, 
and are faced with the choice of heading north or south.

rooms.Name: The Nook
rooms.Description:
There are several bright lights mounted on the wall here, which probably
would not hurt your head so badly if you weren't so drunk!  Maybe it wasn't
a good idea to drink and mud after all!

rooms.Name: The Three-Way Intersection
rooms.Description:
The pipe is much larger here, splitting into three directions.  It is well
lit, and seems better maintained than the rest of the piping in this area.
This is probably due to heavy traffic...

rooms.Name: The Hallway
rooms.Description:
The piping is much narrower here, and there seems to be lots of decays on
the walls and the floor.  It's definitely seen its share of traffic...but
by whom?  This place looks like it hasn't seen the light of day in years!

rooms.Name: The Northeast Corner
rooms.Description:
You stand in a huge round vat...the beer here is up to your ankles, and
quietly gurgles around your feet.  You could probably spend all day in
here and be quite happy...so why not?

rooms.Name: The Northwest Corner
rooms.Description:
You're much deeper into the vat now.  The beer here is at waist level and
the fumes are simply delightful.  You feel like bending over and taking
a huge swig of the holy nectar.

rooms.Name: The Southeast Corner
rooms.Description:
This part of the vat is very shallow, and there's a small broken ladder
on the wall.  At one time, it probably led to the top of the vat where
you could escape.  Of course, why anyone would want to leave a vat full of
beer is totally beyond your comprehension.

rooms.Name: The Southwest Corner
rooms.Description:
The vat is at its deepest point here, and the beer is almost up to your
neck.  If you can swim, now would probably be a very good time to start,
since you're going to go under any time now!

rooms.Name: The Corridor
rooms.Description:
The pipe is very narrow here, and you have a very difficult time crawling
through it.  The areas to the north and south are brightly illuminated, but
this narrow passage is almost dark.

rooms.Name: The Shut-Off Valve
rooms.Description:
You have reached the end of the pipe.  There's a large steel door here, but
it's so corroded that you could never get it open.  It must have been here
a very long time, because it doesn't look all that solid.

rooms.Name: The Passageway
rooms.Description:
This passageway is very normal, and there's really nothing very special about
it.  The walls are grey and metallic, and still give off a hint of a shine
under all the grime.

rooms.Name: The Nook
rooms.Description:
This little recess seems to be more of a defect in the piping than anything
else.  It's a big bulge in the side of the pipe, and judging by all the
garbage laying around it's been very popular with the inhabitants...
whatever they may be!

rooms.Name: a Fork in the Pipe
rooms.Description:
The pipe forks off here, heading to the north, east, and west.  Any way
you go, there's sure to be beer there.  So is there really any wrong
choice in this situation?  I thought not...

rooms.Name: a Backwards Fork in the Pipe
rooms.Description:
The pipe forks here as well, but this time it forks to the south, east, 
and west.  Again, there's beer in all directions so don't fret.  Just take
your pick and have a tall cold one.

rooms.Name: a Large Pool of Beer
rooms.Description:
There's a big leak in the ceiling here, and beer is pouring out from above.
If the hole isn't plugged quickly, the cloud of vapor will surround you.
Hey wait a second...that's not necessarily a bad thing!

rooms.Name: a Grime-Filled Corridor
rooms.Description:
The pipe here is really nasty.  The floor is covered with a huge variety
of pub scum...you really don't want to know how it got here.  You think 
that you also see some puke on the floor.  Now isn't that nice?

rooms.Name: a Very Long Pipe
rooms.Description:
The pipe bends here, and seems to continue on forever to the east.  There's
a soft light coming from the end of the hall, and your beergoggles make you
want to go and check it out!

rooms.Name: In the Middle of the Pipe
rooms.Description:
This is the middle of the long pipe.  You still see the soft light to the
east, and you are really drawn to it.  Maybe that's because you're wearing
your beergoggles, or maybe it's just because it's really neat.

rooms.Name: The Bar
rooms.Description:
You have finally reached the end of the pipe.  The soft light is emitted
here, but you can't tell what from.  It's a very calming place, and you feel
strangely at ease.  You might want to sit down and relax for a while.

rooms.Name: a Very Hot Coil
rooms.Description:
The coils running up and down the wall here are red hot, and if you touch
them you'll definitely burn your finger.  So, the best idea is not to touch
them you idiot!

rooms.Name: The First Slot
The Middle of the Slot
rooms.Description:
You are now standing in the middle of the first toasting slot.  The hot
coils are all around you, and you feel it heating up in here.  You should
probably get out while you still can!

rooms.Name: The Middle of the First Slot
rooms.Description:
You're much deeper in the first slot now, and it's very hot here.  It might
even be hot enough to melt the frosting on a pop tart, but I doubt it.  Those
things are almost impossible to destroy!

rooms.Name: The End of the Coil
rooms.Description:
You're standing at the northern end of the long toasting slot.  The coils
on the walls are VERY hot, so be sure not to touch them.  There are lots of
crumbs on the floor, which may not be so tasty after all of these years.

rooms.Name: The Heating Coil
rooms.Description:
You're standing on the top of the red-hot heating coil!  Get off of it
while you can!  This thing is red hot and will burn you to death if you
don't leave soon!  Get out while there's still time!

rooms.Name: The Right-Side Slot
rooms.Description:
You're standing at the north end of the right-side toasting slot.  This
slot is not quite as big as the other one, but it gets plenty hot!  It's
a bit wider as well...good for bagels!

rooms.Name: The Middle of the Right-Side Slot
rooms.Description:
You're standing in the middle of the right-side toasting slot.  There's
lots of crumbs on the floor here, and there are even a few broken-off pop
tart corners around.

rooms.Name: Along the Cord
rooms.Description:
You're walking a very fine line along the heating cord.  To the north, the
cord continues towards the wall, while to the south the toaster itself
begins.  Which is worse?

rooms.Name: The Power Cord
rooms.Description:
You're standing on the middle of the power cord.  Standing here gives you
a tingle in your feet.  Not enough to hurt, but enough to give you a slight
shock.  Kind of a neat feeling.

rooms.Name: The Plug
rooms.Description:
This is the plug.  You can follow it down into the wall if you really want
to, but that might not be such a good idea.  You might just be better off
forgetting this place ever existed.

rooms.Name: The South Side of the Right-Side Heating Coil
rooms.Description:
You're on the southern end of the right side toaster slot.  There's a ladder
here which leads up to another unknock world.  Do you want to risk messing 
with it, or do you dare face the dangers here?

rooms.Name: The Drive-Thru Window
rooms.Description:
You've just climbed down the stairs and stand in front of a small drive-thru
window at McDonalds!  There's a barely understandable voice coming over the
intercom, and you *think* it's asking what you'd like to order.

rooms.Name: The Front Door
rooms.Description:
This is the front door to the restauraunt.  The patrons are busy streaming
through to get their fill of cholesterol and sugar.  After all, at these
prices it can't be bad for you....can it?

rooms.Name: The Mens Room
rooms.Description:
This is the mens room.  There are several urinals against the wall, and a
few sit-down units in the corner.  It's spotless, like all McDonalds 
restrooms.  Wonder how they manage to keep it like that...

rooms.Name: The Counter
rooms.Description:
You're standing at the counter now, ready to order.  Hmmm....what to have.
Well, you could try the two quarter pounders with cheese for two dollars. Or,
maybe you'd like to try the Big Mac.  Either way, I'm sure you won't be
satisfied.  Type "list" to get a menu.

rooms.Name: The Ladies Room
rooms.Description:
The Ladies restroom is just as spotless as you would expect it to be at
McDonalds.  There are no urinals here, but there are indeed several sit-down
units against the wall.  There's also a tampon machine on the wall, in case
it's that time of the month.

rooms.Name: The Food-Prep Area
rooms.Description:
This area is spotless, except for all the food that's laying around.  There
are several minimum-wage employees scurrying to and fro preparing the food.
Hey...did that guy just spit on a burger???

rooms.Name: The Manager's Office
rooms.Description:
This is the manager's office.  He's really lucky, because he probably makes
an extra 50 cents every hour.  It really shows, because he gets to wear a
striped shirt instead of the plain one!

rooms.Name: The Dumpster
rooms.Description:
This dumpster is nasty!  This is where they throw all the leftover food that
they can't sell.  No wonder it smells so bad...the garbage probably hasn't 
been picked up for several weeks!

rooms.Name: The Pasta Bowl
rooms.Description:
You have climbed down into a huge L-Shaped bowl of pasta.  There are all
kinds of noodles here, but they look pretty darn mean.  I wouldn't want to
take a chance messing with them if I was you.

rooms.Name: South end of the Bowl
rooms.Description:
This is the south end of the pasta bowl.  There are lots of noodles stacked
here, and it's very hard to move about.  Maybe you should just consider
eating your way through it.

rooms.Name: Middle of the Bowl
rooms.Description:
You have entered the middle of the pasta bowl.  The noodles are at their
thickest point here, and there are more than you could possibly ever think
about eating.  Don't give up though!

rooms.Name: A Curve in the Bowl
rooms.Description:
This bowl is indeed L-Shaped, and here it bends to the east and to the 
south.  Those are your two choices.  Both ways are filled with noodles
though, so it won't be an easy task.

rooms.Name: The Short Side
rooms.Description:
This is the middle of the short side of the bowl.  There's nothing really
all that special about it, except for all of the noodles and sauce lying
about.  Just eat it!

rooms.Name: End of the Bowl
rooms.Description:
This is the end of the bowl.  There aren't quite as many noodles here, and
the sauce is sticking to the side of the bowl.  Ahhh....there's also a 
ladder leading down here.

rooms.Name: Southwest Corner
rooms.Description:
This is the southwest corner of the fridge.  There are lots of old packages
wrapped in tin foil here.  No idea what they are.....and you're not sure
you really want to know anyways!

rooms.Name: The Fridge
rooms.Description:
You have descended into a very cold area...it looks like you're in a very
large refridgerator.  It's so cold that if you stay here too long you could
freeze to death!

rooms.Name: The Southeast Corner
rooms.Description:
This is the southeast corner of the fridge.  There are several boxes of
frozen waffles here, and they look like they have been here for quite a
few years.  You know you don't want to eat these!

rooms.Name: The West Side of the Freezer
rooms.Description:
This is the west side of the freezer.  There are several pieces of old
meat here, but they have such bad freezer burn that they don't look like
they're even CLOSE to tasty!

rooms.Name: The Centre of the Freezer
rooms.Description:
This is the centre of the freezer.  There is all kinds of crap piled here,
and most of it predates the dinosaurs.  Actually, there probably is some
frozen dinosaur if you look carefully.

rooms.Name: The East Side of the Freezer
rooms.Description:
You're standing on the east side of the freezer now.  This may be the part
where Jeffrey Dahmer keeps his prized possessions.  However, you don't want
to know if this is truth or rumour.

rooms.Name: The Northwest Corner
rooms.Description:
Here in the northwest corner of the freezer there are several microwave
dinners stacked.  There is some Healthy Choice, some Lean Cuisine, a few
Swanson Hungry Man dinners, and of course, couple of frozen burritos.

rooms.Name: The North Side of the Freezer
rooms.Description:
This is the north side of the freezer.  To your north is the small little
door to the ice cream compartment.  To your south is the vastness of the
rest of the freezer.

rooms.Name: The Northeast Corner
rooms.Description:
You're in the extreme northeastern corner of the freezer now.  There are
leftovers from decades ago here...things your roommates never bothered to
warn you about!

rooms.Name: The Ice Cream Department
rooms.Description:
You are in the small compartment of the freezer where you put the ice cream.
It's a very small compartment, only able to hold two or three pints of ice
cream at once.  Far too small...

rooms.Name: a Small and Dark Hallway
rooms.Description:
This hallway is very dark and narrow.  You wonder what kind of dangers could
be waiting for you to the east.  Whatever it is, it's garding your way to the
eigth floor, so you'll have to face it.

rooms.Name: Boiling Water
rooms.Description:
Coming out of the darkness, you find yourself in hot water...literally.  This
place is filled with steaming water and lots of boiling noodles.  This can
only be home to that most vicious of orange monsters....Kraft Dinner!

rooms.Name: The End of the Dark Hall
rooms.Description:
You have reached the end of the dark hall.  There is a spiral staircase here,
leading down to the depths of level eight.  How much longer must you search
in your quest for the lost fridge?

rooms.Name: A Spiral Staircase
rooms.Description:
This spiral staircase leads up to the seventh level.  You are standing on 
the eighth and deepest level of the fridge now.  You have almost completed
your quest for the lost fridge.  What lies to the east only the creator of
this zone knows...

rooms.Name: The Lost Fridge
rooms.Description:
You have finally found the lost fridge.  There is a large black hole leading
down into the ground which appears to be the only escape from this area.  
There is an invisible force here which seems very powerful, and you have a
desire to flee it as soon as possible.
